thread.title: Re: my bills do not show online
thread.title_full: Re: my bills do not show online

author: drking
title: Re: my bills do not show online
text:
Get tailored support with your TalkTalk account and bills.
yesterday
sigh - trying to download bills - the service stalls as it tries to find the bills - sayong 'loading'
tried twice today
Could someone from talktalk do something about this please?
6 minutes ago
Thank you - that was the page I checked before.
I guess I have to accept that talktalk website just doesn't work sometimes. I've forgotten what settings this browser has, but to have to adjust them for a single website (when every other website works OK) shows that the people who wrote talktalk website software are incompetent I think.
I have tried on another PC btw. Probably I just have to wait for another week and hope. Sigh.
Thankyou for replying - I notice talktalk themselves seem disinterested...
21 minutes ago
You can check for maintenance notices here, [@drking](/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/123583):
https://community.talktalk.co.uk/t5/Service-Status-Dashboard/bd-p/service
It's always to be found listed on the community menu.
Other than that, clearing History/ cookies, allowing pop ups, disabling ad blockers, or starting all over with another browser are all the routine processes to try.
27 minutes ago
no idea, can't recall. I'm just used to talktalk having tech issues. hence the sigh
there was no maintenance on the list yesterday
maybe there is another page that tells me about website maintenance - looks like it was hidden away somewhere last time I had trouble
yesterday
Is it the same issue that you had before, [@drking](/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/123583).
https://community.talktalk.co.uk/t5/Billing/bills-not-available-on-website/td-p/3057304
